tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Starting moving not fb2 files'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Starting moving not fb2 files'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' All files with incorrect format are moved to trash folder'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' All files with incorrect format are moved to trash folder'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Starting filling book table'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Starting filling book table'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Book table is filled'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Book table is filled'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Starting filling words table'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Starting filling words table'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Words table is filled'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Words table is filled'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' Starting moving processed fb2 files'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' Starting moving processed fb2 files'

tests.name: Check log table for the correct status ' All processed files are moved to processed folder'
tests.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logs WHERE log_message=' All processed files are moved to processed folder'
